backend/main.mo: Defines cricket match types, access control, user profile management, and match history storage with role‑restricted operations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for deployment retry diagnostics, including affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files and components for reference.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring views, routing, dialogs, theming, query client, and deployment diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/Analytics.tsx: Analytics dashboard that loads matches with optional date filtering and renders charts or fallback states.
frontend/src/components/CurrentPlayers.t: Displays current batsmen and bowler with dialogs for adding, changing, and retiring players, including strike and state logic.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentDiagno: Dialog showing deployment diagnostics with tabs for overview, full error, and suggestions, plus copy and clear actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with view switching, match controls, diagnostics access, and dialogs for resetting, new matches, and clearing history.
frontend/src/components/InningsTransitio: Dialog shown between innings displaying first‑innings summary and target, with a button to start the second innings.
frontend/src/components/MatchAnalyticsVi: View that loads match data and analytics, showing charts for batsmen, bowlers, and score comparisons with back navigation.
frontend/src/components/MatchCompleteDia: Dialog saving completed match results, preventing duplicates, computing winner, and converting players to backend format.
frontend/src/components/MatchHistory.tsx: Lists saved matches with scores and dates, handling loading/errors and allowing navigation to scorecards or analytics.
frontend/src/components/MatchScorecard.t: Renders a detailed scorecard for a selected match with innings summaries, batting and bowling tables, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/MatchStats.tsx: Displays live match statistics including batting and bowling tables with strike rate and economy calculations.
frontend/src/components/NewMatchDialog.t: Provides a dialog to configure and start a new match with team info, overs, toss selection, and date.
frontend/src/components/ScoreDisplay.tsx: Shows the current match score, run rates, overs, projected totals, and target info for second innings.
frontend/src/components/ScoringButtons.t: Offers scoring controls for runs, extras, and wickets with validation and feedback to update match state.
frontend/src/components/ScoringPanel.tsx: Main scoring interface that shows score display, players, scoring buttons, and match dialogs, or a start screen if no match is active.
frontend/src/contexts/MatchContext.tsx: Defines the cricket match state context and provider with logic for updating runs, wickets, overs, innings transitions, and players/bowlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeploymentDiagnost: Reads, parses, and manages deployment error diagnostics from localStorage and URL parameters with debug mode controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading identities, handling login/logout, and exposing login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for storing matches, fetching histories/analytics, clearing data, and date-based filters.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS and defines theme variables for dark mode and UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentErrorParser: Parses deployment error strings, classifies them as build or deploy issues, and provides descriptions and suggestions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, known issues, existing features, and pending feature requests for fixing duplicate match history entries.
